title: Civista Bancshares sees net interest margin expansion with focus on core deposits and cost reduction

Earnings Call Insights: Civista Bancshares (NASDAQ:CIVB) Q4 2024

Management View

  • Dennis Shaffer, President and CEO, highlighted a net income of $9.9 million, or $0.63 per diluted share, for the quarter, representing an 18% increase over the linked quarter. For the full year, net income was $31.7 million, or $2.01 per diluted share. He noted
